Rockville.Falls Road Park (Hadley\u2019s Park): Falls Road Park (also locally referred to as Hadley’s Park) is an urban park located in Potomac, Maryland. The park covers twenty acres acquired by M-NCPPC (Maryland-National Capital Park and Planning Commission) in 1986. The park contains multi-purpose playing fields used for recreational and sporting events such as soccer, baseball/softball, football, picnics and small fairs.
